resources.string: EazyCampus : A Campus app for TKM College of Engineering students that eases the process of browsing website, getting marks, attendance with much more other useful features.
You are on the border line! Push it up a little.

🔥🎓 Eazy Campus- A Campus app for TKM College of Engineering students that eases the process of browsing website with some amazing extra features.

- Grab Attendance and Marks reports in less than 10 seconds (Believe me!)
- Instant KTU announcements & Campus stories 👨‍🎓👩‍🎓
- Faculty directory: The Complete college staffs/teachers directory
- Intuitive and user-friendly UI.
- Automated Staff Evaluation (Finally😎)

Download the app right now on PlayStore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.diyandroid.eazycampus 

(Apple fanboys need to buy this developer an iPhone to begin the development..Please😜) 

Share this app with your friends and do let them know!

Your friendly geeky👨‍💻,
App developer obviously.
Sorry for enabling ads! But as a student it fills up my coffee and beer mug! I will remove ads with graduation! Pinky Promise!
